description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Port Vila, Vanuatu. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Vanuatu Oceanfront Eco Elegance with Daily All-Day Breakfast & Return Airport Transfers
hotels.description: Discover a serene six-acre waterfront haven nestled within lush tropical gardens at this boutique retreat. Whether you choose to unwind poolside or savour a sunset dinner by the ocean, every moment at Nakatumble is designed for relaxation and connection. Enjoy immersive farm-to-table dining curated by a dedicated chef, using the finest local ingredients. From freshly caught tuna and mahi mahi to homegrown salads and traditional delicacies like tuluk, each meal offers a personalised culinary journey. Beyond the resort, adventure awaits with vibrant local markets, crystal-clear snorkelling spots and trips to natural wonders like the Blue Lagoon. Indulge in rejuvenating massages in the comfort of your accommodation or take a refreshing dip in the natural rock pools - all within this sustainable sanctuary.

hotels.title: Vanuatu Haven with Snorkelling Cove, Day Spa & Resort Pools
hotels.description: A dreamy island retreat awaits at luxurious Iririki Island Resort & Spa, a tropical oasis in the heart of Vanuatu's Port Vila Harbour. This breezy retreat offers access to pristine beaches, vibrant coral reefs and the bustling markets of Port Vila, just a few minutes away by ferry. Savour exquisite local cuisine at the resort's Azure Restaurant, which provides sweeping views of the harbour. Then unwind at the indulgent spa, or snorkel the day away in the picturesque coves before returning to shore and reclining on the white sands or shady pool decks.

hotels.title: Vanuatu Lagoon Luxury with Pool Bar & Kids Club
hotels.description: Wistful dreams of turquoise lagoons and iced-white beaches come true at Holiday Inn Resort Vanuatu, a tropical island paradise. Ideal as a family destination or romantic escape, discover gems such as a kids' club, overwater villas, two swimming pools and a tranquil day spa. When it comes to dining, be wowed by lagoon panoramas and a mouthwatering menu (try the Vanuatu rock lobster) at Verandah, or simply savour a cocktail at the Pool Bar.

hotels.title: Vanuatu Beachfront Hideaway with Swim-Up Pool Bar
hotels.description: Nestled on golden shores, the Ramada Resort by Wyndham Port Vila offers azure views of the glistening Erakor Lagoon from each of its self-contained apartments. Appealing to both couples looking for a romantic getaway, and families searching for a sun-kissed holiday, resort activities include kayaking, stand-up paddle boarding, snorkelling, beach volley and more. After days of fun in the sun, enjoy a refreshing cocktail at the pool swim-up bar or grab a bite to eat at Akiriki Restaurant.

hotels.title: Secluded Vanuatu Beachfront Villa Haven Overlooking the Coral Sea
hotels.description: Feel endless bliss when you stay at Tamanu on the Beach, a Caribbean-inspired resort overlooking the postcard-perfect Coral Sea. This beachfront oasis is home to just 15 traditionally crafted bungalows and promises total serenity with a private white-sand beach, superb beachfront dining at Tamanu Restaurant and an in-house spa. Hop between the surrounding islands to discover hidden swimming holes, incredible waterfalls, ancient volcanoes and beautiful reefs.
